content.query:
create view bronze.vw_rate_code
AS
select  rate_code_id,rate_code from openrowset(
    bulk 'raw/rate_code.json',
    data_source='nyc_taxi_src',
    format='CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR='0x0b'
) with (jsonContent nvarchar(max))as result
cross apply OPENjson(jsonContent) with (rate_code_id tinyint, rate_code varchar(20))

select * from bronze.vw_rate_code



create view bronze.vw_payment_type
AS
select  payment_type, payment_type_desc from openrowset(
    bulk 'raw/payment_type.json',
    data_source='nyc_taxi_src',
    format='CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR='0x0a'
) with (jsonContent nvarchar(max))as result
cross apply OPENjson(jsonContent) with (payment_type tinyint, payment_type_desc varchar(20))

select * from bronze.vw_payment_type
